wikitext.*:
'''Jason Joseph Connery''' ([[11 January|January 11]], [[1963]]) is a British actor, and the son of [[wikipedia:Sean Connery|Sean Connery]]. Jason Connery voiced Captain Carthedan and his [[Wraiths|wraith]] form [[Karsh]] the Whisperer in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II: The Rise of the Witch-king|EA's The Battle for Middle-earth II: The Rise of the Witch-king]]'' and a Ship Captain in ''[[Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor]]''.
